name: com.vrmada.ultimatexr-unity
description:
UltimateXR is a free, open source XR framework and toolkit for Unity that includes powerful features such as:
  ▪ Cross-device compatibility
  ▪ State-of-the-art grab and manipulation mechanics
  ▪ Advanced hand pose editor
  ▪ Inclusion through a library of gender- and race-agnostic hands
  ▪ Customizable full body avatar representation
  ▪ Advanced UI components
  ▪ Locomotion mechanics
  ▪ Fully documented API
  ▪ High-quality assets
...And much more!

Don't forget to install the samples for a nice showcase of all features.

samples.description: Complete Sci-Fi example scenario showcasing half-body avatars, complex manipulation, weapon system and much more. Uses the Universal Render Pipeline.
Scene with a debug panel showing connected XR device info and input states.
